Verses: 1 karththarukkup Bayandhu, Avar Vazhigalil Nadakkiravan Evano, Avan Baakkiyavaan.
2 un Kaigalin Pirayaasaththai Nee Saappiduvaai; Unakkup Baakkiyamum Nanmaiyum Undaayirukkum.
3 un Manaivi Un Veettorangalil Kanitharum Thiraatchakkodiyaippol Iruppaal; Un Pillaigal Un Pandhiyaich Sutrilum Olivamarak Kandrugalaippol Iruppaargal.
4 idho, Karththarukkup Bayappadugira Manushan Ivvidhamaai Aaseervadhikkappaduvaan.
5 karththar Seeyonilirundhu Unnai Aaseervadhippaar; Nee Jeevanulla Naalellaam Erusalemin Vaazhvaik Kaanbaai.
6 nee Un Pillaigalin Pillaigalaiyum, Isravelukku Undaagum Samaadhaanaththaiyum Kaanbaai.
